Description.Name: A Pirated Ferret for Hobbes
Description.Details: The Pirate Ferret is armed with 2 Medium PPPPPPulse lasers and 2 NARC Launcher (P) loaded with Explosive ammo. The typical LAMS has been deleted. The armor has been replaced with Reflective backed up with a Spall Liner. The Ferret is an advanced 45 ton attack Hovertank, with 10/15 move. It has no turret, its weapons are Front mounted. Standard equipment on all models includes: 7.75 tons of Reactive Armor, Recon Sensors, CASE, Laser AMS, Guardian ECM + IFF Jammer Mk1, Beagle Probe, Advanced Optics Mk1 and the unique quirk 'Slippery Customer'. Owning this item allows you to select an alternate hovertank when using Cargo Vroom's unit deploy ability. Hold Shift while placing the unit after activating the deploy ability to select a unit from among those available.
